Name: Gongo
About the game: You play as a knight who is caught in a time loop and over and over again he saves his princess, but every time he wakes up in a new world, where he has not yet saved his princess, but everything comes to an end and someday the loop will break and you will save her by real! Gongo is a 2D side-scrolling platformer where the player goes through levels killing enemies and saving the princess. Each level has amazing hand-picked worlds. On each of the levels, a princess is hidden, which must be rescued and delivered to your castle, cleaning up enemies along the way. Game features: - Nice visual style - Dynamic music - Many levels - High difficulty
